export var NEW_COLOR="NEW_COLOR";export var NEW_QUOTE="NEW_QUOTE";export var PREV_QUOTE="NEW_QUOTE";export var NEXT_QUOTE="NEW_QUOTE";export var INCREMENT="INCREMENT";export var INCREMENT_COLOR="INCREMENT_COLOR";export var DECREMENT="DECREMENT";export var DECREMENT_COLOR="DECREMENT_COLOR";export var JUMP_STATE="JUMP_STATE";export var DARK_MODE="DARK_MODE";export var LIGHT_MODE="LIGHT_MODE";export var GRAB_CARD="GRAB_CARD";// action creators
